NASDAQ: GOOG) today announced financial results for the quarter and the fiscal year ended December 31, 2010. "Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year," said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google Inc. . Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google Inc. and the wider web. announced plans to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Starting from April 4, Larry Page, Google Inc. Co-Founder, will take charge of Google Inc. 's day-to-day operations
